citation: Honkola T, Vesakoski O, Korhonen K, Lehtinen J, Syrjänen K & Wahlberg N. 2013. Cultural and climatic changes shape the evolutionary history of the Uralic languages. Journal of Evolutionary Biology, 26(6):1244–1253.
name: Cultural and climatic changes shape the evolutionary history of the Uralic languages
